text.__SUMMARY__: Arthrostylidium excelsum is a species of Arthrostylidium bamboo in the grass family.
text.Distribution: Arthrostylidium excelsum is commonly found in Mexico, Central America, and the West Indies.
text.Description:
Arthrostylidium excelsum has a 2–3 mm diameter and can grow up to 100–500 cm long.
